hadiths.text: Abu Huraira (Allah be pleased with him) reported the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) as saying:For one among my Ummah who shows endurance against the hardships and rigours of Medina, I would be an intercessor or a witness on his behalf on the Day of Resurrection

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّرْغِيبِ فِي سُكْنَى الْمَدِينَةِ وَالصَّبْرِ عَلَى لأْوَائِهَا
chapter.eng-name: Encouragement to live in Al-Madinah and to be patient on bearing its distress and hardships
